EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1325783333.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Inquiry (1325783333.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Bill,
We do, but the business model is more than just payroll services for IC’s. We provide an alternative to self incorporation for independent consultants. I have attached a link to a PDF below for you to review and if you have additional questions about the model and how our program works I would be happy to have a conversation with you about it.
http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Welcome_to_MBO_Partners.pdf
Thank you and have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Bill Trevor [mailto:bill.trevor@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 04, 2012 6:55 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Inquiry
Hi Nicolette,
Does MBO allow self employed consultants to use MBO for invoicing and payments?
Thanks!
Bill On Wed, Jan 4, 2012 at 3:21 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote:
Dear Bill, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services or answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube: http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4.
I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners!
Have a great afternoon, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
